title: (x) anyone know what this "guard" font is? - ITC Golden Cockerel {Nick Cooke}
content:
Hi guys,  
I'm terribly sorry about the quality of this image but I was wondering if anyone can manage to recognise what font it is?  
Thanks a million.  
warm regards,  
Iara
